allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement NEAT reinforcement learning for Chrome Dinosaur Game

- Added NEAT neural network integration for autonomous gameplay
- Implemented 7-input, 3-output network architecture
- Created evolution-based learning with population of 50 agents
- Fixed jump physics with position-based ground detection
- Added multi-generation support with proper pygame reinitialization
- Configured NEAT parameters for optimal learning
- Created comprehensive technical README documenting RL aspects

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update README: make more concise and focus on current implementation

- Removed comparisons to previous iterations
- Removed folder structure section
- Condensed content while maintaining technical accuracy
- Streamlined sections for better readability

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
